wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Hew Gilbert (28 August 1958 – 27 May 1995) was an English footballer who made 134 appearances in the Football League playing as a left back for Sunderland, Cardiff City and Darlington in the 1970s and 1980s. He also played non-league football for North Shields.

response: * Tim Gilbert (journalist), Australian journalist and radio and TV personality
